unittitle_ssm: Avram Finkelstein Papers
abstract_ssm: The Avram Finkelstein Papers consist of materials related to the life and work of New York artist and gay rights activist Avram Finkelstein. The bulk of the collection focuses on AIDS-related groups, organizations, individuals, and art collectives responding to political and social movements between the mid-1980s and the late 1990s. A fair amount of material is also drawn from Finkelstein's affiliations with ACT UP, his affinity group Anonymous Queers, and the art collective Gran Fury.
subject_ssm: Artists -- New York (State) -- New York -- Political activity
heading_ssm: Avram Finkelstein Papers
